meta.description: CSSSR offers DevOps solutions: reinforce your web application with reliable back-end development and duly adjusted infrastructure.

hero.title:
Back-end
and DevOps
hero.description: Reinforce your web application with reliable back-end development and duly adjusted infrastructure.

backEndDevelopment.title: Back-end Development
backEndDevelopment.description: It is not only the appearance of your product that matters, but also how smoothly, flexibly and reliably the part hidden from users performs.
backEndDevelopment.imgAlt: The work of a backend developer is not noticeable, but very important

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: Although front-end development was our only specialization for years, now we also provide back-end web solutions so we can develop products from the top down.

firstItem.title: Full Stack web development
firstItem.description: We turn your design layouts into a complete working product.

secondItem.title: Only back-end development
secondItem.description: We’ll handle back-end tasks to let your team focus on the priority goals.

thirdItem.title: Third-party services integration
thirdItem.description: We’ll help you to build a strong network of necessary data across different services and applications.

techStack.title: Back-end Tech Stack
techStack.description: Being front-end experts, we also work with a wide range of back-end technologies so we can develop an excellent web product all the way through.
techStack.mongoDb: We select databases subject to the project needs and specific tasks: MongoDB (NoSQL) or PostgreSQL.
techStack.java: We can write on well-proven Java, but we prefer Kotlin — a modern language working on JVM (Java Virtual Machine).
techStack.experts: Our experts are ready to advise you on the technologies that would fit your project most.
techStack.link: Take a look at the other technologies we use
techStack.javaImgAlt: Styled logos of Kotlin and Java

devOpsServices.title: DevOps Services
devOpsServices.subtitle: We offer the DevOps service as a part of our software development process.
devOpsServices.description: Our DevOps engineers always work side by side with our development teams creating, configuring, and supporting a reliable and secure environment for each project.
devOpsServices.imgAlt: Illustration with a man holding a laptop connected to a server

continuous.title: Continuous Integration
continuous.description: We implement CI systems to ensure that all developers’ pull requests go through automatic testing to verify the code before merging.

automatic.title: Automatic Deployment
automatic.description: We use containers to pack an application and all its dependencies to make deployment hassle-free.

cluster.title: Cluster Management and Optimization
cluster.description: We can take care of a server environment configuration depending on project’s current needs and future development plans.

maintenance.title: Maintenance and Monitoring
maintenance.description: Our engineers continuously support and monitor development environment throughout the whole development process to ensure that no time is lost due to the development environment unavailability.
